    Created by jannetim on 12/02/15. Class for handling multiple sensors

        public org.json.JSONObject getSensorData(int sensorId)
                                  throws org.json.JSONException
        Returns sensor data from a selected sensor as a JSONObject
        Parameters:
        sensorId - Integer value of the sensor to specify it
        Returns:
        If sensor is set 'active' sensor is asked for data; returns JSONObject either with values or empty
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException
